website_summaries.verdict: A durable choice at a value price. You won't get a better travel mug at a price lower than this.
pros: A solid travel mug at a budget price
Stainless steel construction and double-walled construction
Tapered for cup holders, and BPA free

customer_reviews.title: Love This Cup!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is AWESOME! I don't care for camo designs, got it because of the low price, but the design is actually really nice. Real tree look. I've used my RTIC 30oz tumbler every day since I bought it and it still looks new. Bought two of these and gave one to my husband. He works in an un-airconditioned factory with temperatures well over 100° this summer and the cup kept ice through his entire 12hr shift and way past. It's been a life saver for him. Wish I got this last year. Thinking of getting more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Robicheaux

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camo design and it is a quality product. However, my issue is that the lid has no cover for the drinking hole so it is not leak proof while driving or walking around. You can buy third party lids to make it more of a travel mug. I've not used this for cold yet but it keeps coffee warm for 12 hours so it works! I don't mind the size but be forewarned this is a big mug! Item does fit in the cup holder of my truck due to its design with a slimmer base.
customer_reviews.author: TechDude

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular brand for my husband. I have a yeti myself, but we tried it out last night. We filled this brand and my yeti with ice last night and guess what this morning they both still had ice in them. I would highly recommend this brand instead of spending 40.00 on a yeti cup, because I wish I would have found this brand earlier. I would have bought this instead of my yeti to save some money. I will be purchasing another one for myself. Great buy for the price, if you do not want to spend that kind of money on a yeti.
customer_reviews.author: dodge woman

customer_reviews.title: I received an RTIC tumbler as a gift and loved it so much that I purchased one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I received an RTIC tumbler as a gift and loved it so much that I purchased one for my fiance. He uses it every morning for his coffee and loves it. Works great for cold beverages too. I read the reviews before purchasing and noticed that people were saying that it does not hold up well in the dishwasher. I have only hand washed this tumbler, and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie L.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time. Mostly while camping. Load it up with ice and you’re set till well into the next day. Solid product. Would definitely recommend and buy again. Camo print is nice, came package well. Probably would dent if you dropped it. Also the drink hole doesn’t close so it could spill a little. Lid fits securely and there is no risk of it popping off. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DuckWhisperer99

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT put in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a $10.00 gift for my daughter who loves camo. I’m not 100% sure this is a real RTIC. I own another that I’ve had for a while & put in the dishwasher numerous times (I know it’s not recommended). I assumed I could do the same with this one. Wrong. The camouflage turned a purple color. It doesn’t look like the same cup.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: LID is NOT leakproof. The hole is open with no cover. DO NOT TILT THIS tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that the lid's drinking hole has no cover. So water will spill if tilted. I received it today and returning it back today. I ordered the MalloMe Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated 6-Piece Tumbler Set [Straw, Brush, Handle, 2x Lid Included] Forest Floor Camouflage 30 oz for about the same price and has better result/youtube review compared to RTIC and Yeti. .The Mallome comes with accessories included.
customer_reviews.author: Spyro

customer_reviews.title: Really Work
customer_reviews.text: If you fill this with ice in the morning, it still has ice late at night. We live in Arizona and have had these outside by the pool. They are the only beverage holder that really works in heat (115 degrees F). We are going to have to buy the holders because this is metal and in AZ. you can't pick it up if its been in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. My fiancé wanted a Yeti tumbler, so I got one for her. After seeing how great hers was, I decided to get this for 1/4 the cost. Haven't done any side by side comparisons to see how they match up, but I've gotten a drink with ice around dinner time and woke up the next morning with ice still in the cup. That's good enough for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: theking

customer_reviews.title: I like this one.
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine now for about a year and a half. I thought the skin might scratch easily but I take this to work everyday and I am not gentle with it. The skin/design is still perfect. Leak proof depends on the lid you get for it. I really like it. The price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: the first one fits perfect. Why are they 2 different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cup and 1 week later, bought the same (or so I thought) exact one, the second order cup was bigger at the top of the cup then the first order. It does not fit at all with the handle(sold separately), the first one fits perfect. Why are they 2 different sizes? I "re-ordered" from the first order! My husband likes the cup, but I want 2 of the same size cups.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly duvall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cup and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great cup to have and we’ll made. I added a parachute material handle to go along with the camp cup and everyone who sees my it sitting next to my chair has positive comments. Ice lasts over 24 hours so you can get up the next day and still have ice water in the cup. Add a stainless steel straw and your all set.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for holding ice for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: This cup is awesome. I bought it for my husband and he loves it. The Camo is painted on nicely and just looks like it's a great quality. It keeps ice from melting for an insanely long time. He can put ice water in it before bed and 24 hours later there's still ice in the cup. I have a Yeti and I was a little skeptical considering the price difference, but now I regret spending so much on mine bc they're the exact same quality and mine is plain silver while his has a cool design.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far it works ok, it’s just a cup. What bothered me is the lid is slightly smaller than every other insulated cup brand (yeti, cold1, ozark, etc.) so the lids aren’t interchangeable. I own 6 or 7 similar cups but when I grab this one out of the cub board I have to dig for the one lid that fits.
customer_reviews.author: JnAB

customer_reviews.title: Best tumbler I've purchased so far -- especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a work mug and would be LOST without it -- it's large size allows me to drink more water throughout the day, and it keeps things ice cold. (I've left it over night with ice and it was still cold the next afternoon.) VERY happy with the quality of this tumbler!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sealing lid
customer_reviews.text: Top to mine does not fit properly. Will not push completely down flush, making it very awkward to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: packeroni

customer_reviews.title: Bought a couple of them
customer_reviews.text: Great tumbler, good size. It looks nice and keeps my drinks hot or cold for a long time, and doesn't give any awkward flavor like some that I've bought. Everyone in my house has one now
customer_reviews.author: Seth W

customer_reviews.title: I like this tumbler for its ease of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I like this tumbler for its ease of cleaning, large size, and it holds thing hot or cold for extended periods of time. In fact I like it so much that I ordered a second one for my husband. I will be ordering a smaller version as this one is too big for the cup holders in my new vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Overall... decent, great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a 20oz travel mug, but this 30oz was actually cheaper, so I went for it. It does not sweat at all, and it keeps things pretty cold for the most part. I've only got about an hour out of any ice I've used, but I'm ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the excellent Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the excellent Amazon price. I'm drinking homemade iced coffee from it right now. It stays ice cold all day and is saving me money from stopping for coffee every morning (it literally paid for itself in a week.) It seems to be the same quality as my wife's YETI, but costs less then half the money. That's a no brainer to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: If you want to be the envy of others, get this mug!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mug. Get the USA made paracord camo handle for it. Keeps my coffee hot all morning. Everyone is envious of my camo design. Why pay $40 for the yeti?
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Yeti who?
customer_reviews.text: I think this is just as good as my Yeti but at a much cheeper purchase point. Keeps my drinks just like I poured them in for hours. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cup, tough finish
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leak at the seal like some others I've had and it shouldn't so thanks Artic. They got it right and it is camo...what guy wouldn't want this. People also need to drink. Sounds like a great man gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Glaesmann

customer_reviews.title: Camo quickly fades
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and march and used it twice before I noticed significant fading to the camo wrap. This item was not left in the sun for long periods of time, subjected to normal use only and washed per manufacturers specifications. I am very disappointed in the product and customer service through RTIC. Fading is NOT covered by the warranty (which I understand), however, this should not have become so discolored in such a short period of time. The attached photo shows where I had my handle. I do not recommend this product if you plan on ever taking it out of the house or exposing it to any sunlight whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink cool
customer_reviews.text: This cup keeps my drink cold all day. It was good price. I like the camo pattern. It's easy to clean. It would be a nice gift for that special someone in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: It was cool that it came in camo too which was perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas and he loves it. It was cool that it came in camo too which was perfect for him. It is a great alternative to the Yeti brand for a cheaper price!
customer_reviews.author: SoleilTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great price. ...love the cup!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Received the older version of the rtic 30. Ordered a handle hoping for it to fit. Worked great. Ordered a couple more cups because it was such a great price. ..Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: duck

customer_reviews.title: I got one for myself several months ago. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got one for myself several months ago. I have now purchased one for each member of my family, in various colors. That said, I also bought the Yeti lids so they can be used with the bigger straws.
customer_reviews.author: piefoot

customer_reviews.title: Spill proof lid was pictured when I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The tumblers are awesome, so I ordered 4 as Xmas gift for my hunting buddies. When I ordered the 4 of the tumblers, the photos shown on them had the black clip spill proof lids. When they were delivered yesterday they didn't have the spill proof lids, but just the plain lids. Could I please get the spill proof lids that were supposed to be with the tumblers? Thank you in advance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old inventory!
customer_reviews.text: My wife received one of these as a gift last summer. I figured the one I ordered would be the newest edition, and ordered a handle for it. I received the tumbler and handle, and my tumbler slid right through the handle. It fit my wife's tumbler perfect. I guess Amazon is still shipping out old stock. Shouldn't that have been stated?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusts!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cup does what it says!! Have left hot coffee in it inside the car I’m freezing cold weather for hours and came back out to hot coffee. However, after the first wash (by hand) there was rust along the rim of the cup where the lid meets the cup. Not impressed. Have cheaper stainless cups and bottles and haven’t ever had this problem. Wouldn’t buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nimmo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups I ordered 3 of the & the new 2 of the new lids hold ice most of the day
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is amazing! The 30 oz. size is great for in home or travel. It fits nicely in my vehicle's cup holder. Cold drinks stay cold. Ice lasts all day and sometimes overnight. The price makes this cup a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: WLee

customer_reviews.title: Wrap does not last
customer_reviews.text: Other than the camouflage fading a lot it is a great cup
customer_reviews.author: Chris johnson

customer_reviews.title: The lids on these are not only not leak proof they're just holes like all the cheaper brands provide.  SHAME ON YOU RTIC.
customer_reviews.text: RTIC cups are great products because they're great quality, why did you ruin it by putting a substandard lid on these CAMO ones. One of the best features was that they didn't leak or spill when you carried them. Sorely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nina Clanton

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use it daily. Great for having cool drinks in the height of the summer. Very little melting even in 90 plus degree weather
customer_reviews.author: Chris Swag

customer_reviews.title: It was a Father’s Day gift for my husband, ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a Father’s Day gift for my husband, he loves it. He had a Yeti but now refuses to use it. He says the Rtic is easier to grip and stays colder longer.
customer_reviews.author: D&G

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic! Keeps drinks icy
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! Keeps drinks icy. Great value and I wonder why people are buying the other brand. Just sayin'.
customer_reviews.author: ed294

customer_reviews.title: he loves camp so this was perfect and it works just as well as his yeti ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this, I bought t for him for his birthday, because I had already bought his the smaller Yeti brand tumbler but he wanted a big one too. But I wanted one that was different and not the same stainless steel, he loves camp so this was perfect and it works just as well as his yeti and he actually uses this one more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I owned the Yeti and I did the test to ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned the Yeti and I did the test to compare both of them, they last the same time for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mahdi Fehmi Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: really like this cup but the mouth on the lid is ...
customer_reviews.text: really like this cup but the mouth on the lid is a bit big. i keep spilling it all over me when i take a drink. but figured out that using a straw works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: joseph lee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dad and ex father in law who married my husband and I last month! They both love them!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalC

customer_reviews.title: other than that I like it
customer_reviews.text: the rubber ring around the cap doesn't want to stay where it's suppose to so the cap doesn't fit down right. I'm afraid it's going to spill so I'm extremely careful with it, other than that I like it though
customer_reviews.author: kacie rowe

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I ordered 2 RTIC cups, same size different colors. This one doesn't keep water cold. Ice melts in about an hour :( The other one is perfect but the camo one is not
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup, it definitely works just as good as the Name brand Yetti but half the price. I've had ice from the night before still left in cup. It was a great investment along with the handle I bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: gnomze

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He lives it and uses it everyday!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryBrooke

customer_reviews.title: While it keeps liquid hot and cold it has an annoying "tinging" noise coming from the inside that makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: First ever RTIC product and not sure i am impressed. While it keeps liquid hot and cold it has an annoying "tinging" noise coming from the inside that makes it little less likely to be used as often as i wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to a good beating.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tumbler. Built with great quality and the camo on it looks awesome too. It works just as its supposed to and so far has withstood the beating of being in a patrol car. So far not even a scratch on the camo finish.
customer_reviews.author: Arron V

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold, I can keel the same ice cubes from when I leave for work till I get home
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Cup
customer_reviews.text: The tumbler was even better than pictures. The camo didn't look cheap or fake. I was slightly concerned with ordering the camo versus regular silver in case it would chip or peel but I don't feel that will be an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hone

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it and keeps my coffee hot and my sodas cold
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite cups! I take it everywhere with me
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite cups! I take it everywhere with me. I’ve only used it for cold drinks but it’s works amazingly! Ice water will stay icy for well over 24 hours! Love the camel design! I recommend this brand to anyone. It’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Best cup around.
customer_reviews.text: This cup will keep ice 24 hours. I fill it with ice and cold soda before work and refill it with cold water several times during the day. It will still be half full of ice when I get home from work. No other cup I've had will even come close to matching this RTIC.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome print
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the print and we have several RTIC tumblers happy to add this one to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Penny P

customer_reviews.title: Fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: Paint started fading as soon as I got it. Mostly in areas i touched. Pretty much white now
customer_reviews.author: Hello it is me.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup! Does what it's supposed to. I've only used it for cold beverages, but it keeps the drink cold for long periods of time. Liked it so much I bought another one to keep at the office!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my fiance for Christmas and he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance for Christmas and he loves it. Constantly carries it with him wherever he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big cup club
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a guy friend who wanted to be in the big cup club and always commented on my orange one. He loves it just as much as I love mine. I will continue to buy rtic.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Young

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. It keeps my drink cold all day long
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It keeps my drink cold all day long. I work 12 hours as a nurse and it's nice to have a cold drink all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES!!! Ice lasts all day, coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: YES!!! Ice lasts all day, coffee stays warm as long as I have it!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Schopflin

customer_reviews.title: Great size and design
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband and he loves it. We hand wash it. I read reviews of the color coming out because of being put in the dish washer so we don’t do that. Great size and design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels every bit as good as its leading competitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid cup. Feels every bit as good as its leading competitor. I started my day full of ice water and refilled 5 times during the day and still had my original ice left at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Good quality and does exactly what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Heath E. Bletzacker

customer_reviews.title: Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Keeps liquid very cold and it easy to handle. Camo look is very much to my husband's liking.
customer_reviews.author: JANEAN KEILEN

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cup. Fussed at the hubs for spending so much on it, but it turned out to be so pretty!! Plus, we are big Rtic fans.
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Not all 30oz tumblers from one manufacturer are the same design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas gifts. They loved them! Unfortunately the extra lid and handle that I purchased at the same time don't work with this tumbler. The circumference of the widest part is bigger than the circumference on the RTICs my husband and I have.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great cup for great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a birthday gift for my husband and he loves it!! Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper from RTIC. Shop around.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice. It's a gift for my kids so..e haven't compared them to our yeti tumblers yet. I really like the camo pattern. I'm only giving 3 stars because you can buy them much cheaper from [...]
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it NOW
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Will continue to buy from this company. Ice stays cold all through the night and still have ice in the cup when I wake up in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W.

customer_reviews.title: This cup ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the camo!! Ice last all day in this thing and it also keeps coffee warmer, longer. I feel it would give Yeti a run for its money and with the money you save you could by two more. Very pleased with every aspect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2017
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 years and 10 months ago and still got it, I use it a lot. Still good as new
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Lid seal is better than that of a YETI cup
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you don't put it in the dishwasher. Had no smell or flakes. Lid seal is better than that of a YETI cup. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality feels great, like the camo wrap. Would recommend over YETI for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing product, purchased for husband who is a truck ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing product, purchased for husband who is a truck driver kept drinks ice cold and like the large container! only drawback, it doesn't fit in cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great cup! Got it for my husband after hearing they were better than the yeti's and much cheaper. A yeti holds ice longer but not by that much. This is a much better deal. Looking to buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: I am 100% pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% pleased with this purchase! This thing keeps ice for literally an entire day. I am a truck driver and Iike to keep my Mountain Dew super chilled. I put ice in it early in the morning and I normally still have i e when I finish my run for the day. I fill it with ice around 8:30a and still have ice close to after midnight,if not longer than that. I would buy this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Patrick Turner

customer_reviews.title: Same thing as a YETI, and RTIC is even owned by YETI.
customer_reviews.text: Same thing as a YETI, and RTIC is even owned by YETI. I bought it because my coffee was ice cold just 20 minutes into my morning commute.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Valdivia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing cup pretty much ever. Keeps drinks super cold
customer_reviews.author: Billy w

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for an excellent product. Well made and nice looking bottle. Works really well and will hold ice in a cold beverage overnight. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Korrey Rotkiske

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great, ice stays in for about 12 to 18 hours, no sweating, great price, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: keeps cool things cool and hot things hot for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tati H

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for lost expensive brand
customer_reviews.text: Gulp-gulp... Hubby loves it! Previously had a Yeti and can't tell the difference except it easier to swallow the price, especially if you lose it! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: OuttaMyAttic

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Use it every day and keeps coffee warm for at least 2 hours....great quality
customer_reviews.author: TimB0131

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coffee cup. But needs a handle. It's a bit slippery
customer_reviews.author: FEH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! It's actually printed onto cup, I don't expect it to chip. RTIC has the best cups ever.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Love the cup
customer_reviews.text: Love the cup, but this was not the lid that it came with. It was a plain RTIC lid and NOT the one shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: April Brozak

customer_reviews.title: They look like they will not come off
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father in law. Very impressed with the way the graphics. They look like they will not come off. The cup itself is very sturdy and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was excellent. Looks exactly as the image displayed
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was excellent. Looks exactly as the image displayed. Ice stayed cold all night. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the same as yeti if not better at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same as yeti if not better at a fraction of the cost. Lid has a hole so I recommend buying the seperate spill proof one. Top secures tight
customer_reviews.author: jake priest

customer_reviews.title: Lid drips
customer_reviews.text: Cup works great. Lid sucks. The lid does not fit tight to cup which causes liquid to collect. By the 3rd to 4th drink, a guaranteed spill down your chin. I have a cup from Walmart (Ozark) which does not do this.
customer_reviews.author: WI Bowhunter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mug, its a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend who builds houses for a living. He needed a mug that would be durable enough for the job site, and keep his coffee cold through out his day while being outside. This mug did just that! He would get coffee and 7am and he said it would still be very hot by noon!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Took a great tumbler and ruined it
customer_reviews.text: The change you made by making the top wider is too bulky and big and the lid flap is not user friendly. Love the old cup do not like the new one
customer_reviews.author: DONALD BIANCO

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee warm for a ffee hours. Lid didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee warm for a ffee hours. Lid didn't close, I had to purchase one for it that closed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Realtree Camo Tumbler.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Great tumbler. If you have the means I highly recommend it. Keeps my coffee or tea hot. Camo pattern is great. Super deluxe quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tumbler!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Cup, please keep selling products (cups & coolers) at a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Martin B.

customer_reviews.title: Discolor of cup
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with how the cup keeps my drinks cold but I am not pleased with the outer appearance. The camo has a big spot on it where it is not right. I am very disappointed with that....
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cup for my husband to match his tool box for work. He absolutely loves it. And a perk of having this cup. I'm not picking up styrofoam cups from all over my house ever day. It keeps his drinks cold. And holds ice for about 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Heard

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Works as described. Get for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great cup, can be purchased cheaper off somewhere other than Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Comparable to Yeti however found cheaper than Amazon in my hometown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loves it and it works as good as his yeti
customer_reviews.author: Lisa BTop Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: RTIC 30 oz Tumbler, Kanati Camo
product_meta.description: Size:30oz (1pack)30oz. RTIC Tumblers are stainless steel, double wall vacuum insulated. Keeps your drinks ice cold longer - works great for hot beverages. The crystal clear lid lets you know exactly how much drink you have. Easy to clean.
feature_bullets: Double wall vacuum insulation maximum temperature retention & insulates hands from the cold
Keeps Cold up to 60 hours, keeps Hot up to 12 hours
18/8 stainless steel strong stainless steel construction. No sweat exterior
Narrow & tall design fits more cup holders, easier to grip
Air Tight Seal Heavy duty lid seal locks in the cold

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars860 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
